sentences.en: All contestants must enroll by Saturday.
sentences.cn: 所有参赛者必须在星期六前登记.

sentences.en: And, with the rise of online education, you can even enroll in certified programs that allow you to learn and improve your career during your off-hours.
sentences.cn: 并且，随着在线教育的崛起，你甚至可以参加认证课程，在下班工夫里学习和改善本人的职业生涯。

sentences.en: Enroll in a noontime or an after - work exercise class.
sentences.cn: 参加中午或下班后的锻炼班.

sentences.en: Enroll now, we only have 30 seats for you!
sentences.cn: 现在就加入吧,机不可失, 时不再来.

sentences.en: I must enroll the children for piano lessons before next week.
sentences.cn: 我必须在本周内给孩子们报名学钢琴课.

sentences.en: I should like to enroll all my children in the swimming class.
sentences.cn: 我愿意让我的孩子们都参加游泳班.

sentences.en: Please enroll me in the contest.
sentences.cn: 请登记我的名字,我报名参加这次比赛.

sentences.en: Right , I'd like to enroll for the Monday course, then, please?
sentences.cn: 好, 那么, 我登记星期一的课程.

sentences.en: So Harry, you're going to enroll in this school today, I think ?
sentences.cn: 那么哈里, 今天就是来报名的 吧 ?

sentences.en: So you are planning to enroll in an English language program at the University of Pennsylvania.
sentences.cn: 那么你打算去宾西法尼亚大学的英语班就读了.

sentences.en: Student: Yes, I'd like to enroll for the English training course.
sentences.cn: 学生: 是的, 我想注册英语训练课程.

sentences.en: The school will enroll new students in August.
sentences.cn: 这所学校将于八月份招收新生.

sentences.en: They enroll him as a member of the club.
sentences.cn: 他们吸收他为俱乐部会员.

sentences.en: We may enroll another two classes of 20 students each.
sentences.cn: 我们可以再招收两个班,每班20个学生.

sentences.en: We shall enroll people to train as teachers.
sentences.cn: 我们要招收一些人来培训为教师.

sentences.en: You need to enrol before the end of August.
sentences.cn: 你必须在八月底前注册。

sentences.en: You need to enroll before the end of August.
sentences.cn: 你必须在八月底前注册。

sentences.en: You were sent tHere because HigH scHools wouldn't enroll you anymore.
sentences.cn: 你被送到那,是因为高校不收你.

words.tran_cn: 参加；登记；注册；记入名册
登记；使加入；把...记入名册；使入伍

trans.tran_en: to officially arrange to join a school, university, or course, or to arrange for someone else to do this
